name: Hop Ball - Hop To Crush Slices
name_original: Hop Ball - Hop To Crush Slices
description:
Search diamonds for upgrade and exciting bonus!
Slide right or left, make the spiral tower rotate to help the ball over obstacles.

Beat your score and compete with others to reach the highest score in the world!

Features:
-Unique addictive gameplay mechanics.
-Rich visual effects.
-Many kinds of obstacles and rewards.
-Simple and smooth slide controls.
